items.sentence: You're the last person in the world I would like to see cloned; you're boring enough on your own.
Tom, who was adopted at birth, only met his biological mother for the first time a few weeks ago.
With his mother very sick and a tight deadline at work, Tom has a lot on his plate at the moment.
This song samples a bunch of old American funk records from the 70s using equipment from the 90s.
Carbon monoxide is a poisonous substance formed by the incomplete combustion of carbon compounds.
